item.title: Howto: WWAN on a Lenovo ThinkPad X100e with Ubuntu 10.04
item.description: I could not find a single correct and useful description how to get the Gobiâ„¢ 2000 PCI Express Mini Card, that is built into some Lenovo ThinkPad X100e models, to work with Ubuntu Linux 10.04 LTS “Lucid Lynx” on Google (which is identical to the Internet). Therefore I want to share my knowledge with you, before I forget everything. This howto might also work for other notebooks that use the same WWAN/UMTS/3G card (like the ThinkPad T410).
